items.content_html: Lightweight library inspired by the Flutter framework (html.js), the Angular framework (renderer.js, css.js) and the JQuery Library (utils.js, prototype.js) which includes a set of utilities and prototypes to prevent losses of production time and to help the developers write fewer lines of code.

items.content_html: CacheXS is a high-performance, TypeScript-written caching library for JavaScript and Node.js, leveraging ioredis and optimized for both TypeScript and JavaScript integration. It's compact yet powerful, offering ESM compatibility for modern, lightweight to complex applications.
items.title: 3adel-bassiony/CacheXS: CacheXS is a high-performance, TypeScript-written caching library for JavaScript and Node.js, leveraging ioredis and optimized for both TypeScript and JavaScript integration. It's compact yet powerful, offering ESM compatibility for modern, lightweight to complex applications.
